personalities: Smart, Nimble, Very Frail / Very Nimble, Frail, Tender or Foolish
sets.detail:
200 Ranged Attack maximizes your damage output 
 200 Speed maximizes speed but with Nimble you can outspeed Nimble Ragoon and anything slower. With Very Nimble you can Speed tie Nimble Tahtab and Garbantis, you also outspeed Nimble Wendolen and anything slower 
 52 Energy allows for 1 Fire Breath / 2 Peace of Minds And 3 Raging Howls 
 48 HP is leftovers but also gives you 10 HP per health Amulet tick
sets.author: Saur
